# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily life or work experience significantly. With its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $120. I believe it offers great value and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
